channel.title: Talking to npcs
channel.description: I've used every tutorial that tells you how to talk to npcs and they never work I have seen them work on other servers the only npcs that talk are bankers, horvik and aubry :mad: is there something i need to add for more npcs? i am using cheezscape pk source

item.title: Talking to npcs
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

Gah its so easy i ficed it up in 10 seconds… :rolleyes:

use this insted of what silab posted, if ur using cheezscape.

if(converse.equals("hello banker")){
                                server.npcHandler.npcs[1].updateRequired = true;
                                server.npcHandler.npcs[1].textUpdateRequired = true; 
                                server.npcHandler.npcs[1].textUpdate = "hello "+playerName;
                                }

Read full topic
